page.title: 07LIGHT INDUSTRY AT EGMERE
page.content: In an area so agricultural, it's not surprising that the two light industries are a{Chemical Company (offering advice to farmers) and a {Milling Company}who produce all kinds of animal feed. Both these businesses are established on the site of a wartime R.A.F. base. Ex-hangars are used as stores and the prefabs. erected for airforce personnel, as homes for employees.{Crop Care {Chemicals Ltd.}was founded in 1961 and has developed into a concern specialising in crop protection. Through its{agronomists}it advises on all aspects of{crop health}and supplies related products. It offers advice on application techniques and is backed by its own technical research. Twenty-eight employees are involved in providing this crop protection service.
